annotations.description: When I was a newly minted bartender at Cole's this drink went on the menu as a Garibaldi. Now that I know better, and we know that a Garibaldi is a wholly di...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Fall Enzoni

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Rye Whiskey
1oz (30ml) Campari
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
3-4 Large Red Grapes (or 6-8 Small ones)
Orange Peel Flower and Grape Garnish

Muddle in tin and shake. 
Double strain over ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dbb9z2JPbSM
title: Fall Enzoni
